Position.Title: Arts Initiatives and Events Officer
Position.BriefRoleStatement: Supporting Public Schools NSW personnel through the development, coordination and delivery of Kindergarten to Year 12 (K-12) arts initiatives and events.
Position.StatementOfDuties:
• Contributing to unit-wide programs and planning, as required.
  • Coordinating a variety of procedures relating to implementation and staging of events, including risk management and preparing schedules, meeting the needs and requirements of all stakeholders.
  • Coordinating students and schools to participate in large scale events.
  • Coordinating the design, delivery and evaluation of high quality arts programs which meet the needs of a broad range of students and teachers throughout the state.
  • Liaising with key stakeholders, including educational services teams, directorates, other government agencies and industry professionals relating to arts initiatives and events.
  • Preparing budgets, action plans, briefings, website materials and reports relating to arts programs and events.
  • Supervising the work of support staff, casual staff and tutors engaged for arts initiatives and events.
  • Working as a member of diverse teams to design, deliver and evaluate arts professional learning resources and events in a K-12 environment to achieve enhanced student outcomes.
